mapper.select: select o.id as id, o.org_name as orgName, o.max_num as maxNum, o.now_num as nowNum from tb_organization o right join tb_user_org uo on o.id = uo.org_id right join sys_user u on uo.user_id = u.id where u.id = 11

SELECT h.id as id, u.username as fromName,h.content as content,h.fromId as fromId from tb_organization o left join tb_history h on h.toId = o.id left join sys_user u on h.fromId = u.id where h.state = 2 and o.id = #{orgId}
